channel.title: Nodes on SwissRN
channel.description: Recent content in Nodes on SwissRN

item.title: Nodes
item.description: Local Nodes of the SwissRN build the backbone of the network by initiating and coordinating activities at universities and other research institutions. Activities of local nodes are manifold, e.g. open research working groups, ReproducibiliTea journal clubs, organisation of training activities such as carpentries workshops, grant and ethics peer review groups etc. The organisation of local nodes differs from institution to institutions from a formalized administration to informal grassroot groups.
